hero.title: Smart HR Management for Modern Businesses
hero.subtitle: Save 80% of time with automated attendance, accurate payroll and real-time reporting. Trusted by 50+ businesses.

features.title: Everything you need in one platform
features.subtitle: From attendance to payroll, shift management to reporting - all seamlessly integrated
features.checkTimeDesc: Multiple methods: GPS, WiFi, QR Code, Face ID. Auto-calculate working hours, overtime, night shifts per labor law
features.shiftManagementDesc: Create shift templates, auto-assign shifts, easy swap. Real-time notifications to employees via app
features.contractsDesc: Manage labor contracts, track expiration dates, secure cloud document storage
features.analyticsDesc: Visual dashboard, real-time detailed reports. One-click Excel, PDF export

why.title: Trusted by hundreds of businesses
why.description: Tamabee is developed by a team with real HR management experience in Vietnam and Japan, understanding business needs.

cta.title: Ready to upgrade your HR management?
cta.description: Sign up today and experience 14 days free. No credit card required.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business size

about.title: About Us
about.description: Tamabee is a modern HR management platform that helps businesses optimize their employee management processes.

confirmSave.title: Confirm Save Changes
confirmSave.description: Are you sure you want to save these settings changes?

workMode.title: Work Mode
workMode.description: Select the work mode that suits your company
workMode.fixedHoursDesc: Employees work fixed hours daily without shift scheduling. Suitable for offices and administrative companies.
workMode.flexibleShiftDesc: Employees can be assigned to different shifts. Suitable for factories, retail, and 24/7 services.
workMode.confirmChangeDesc: Changing the work mode will affect how the system displays and calculates. Are you sure you want to change?
workMode.schedulesWillBeInactive: Existing schedules will be marked as inactive.

workMode.title: Work Mode Selection Guide
workMode.desc: Work mode determines how the system manages working hours and calculates attendance for employees. Choose the mode that fits your company's operations.
workMode.tip1: Fixed Hours is suitable for offices and administrative companies with fixed working hours
workMode.tip2: Flexible/Shift-based is suitable for factories, retail, and 24/7 services
workMode.tip3: You can change the mode anytime, existing schedules will be preserved

attendance.title: Attendance Configuration Guide
attendance.desc: Set up default working hours, time rounding rules, and check-in options for employees.
attendance.tip1: Configure late/early leave grace periods to avoid unnecessary penalties
attendance.tip2: Enable GPS requirement if you need to control check-in locations
attendance.workModeNote: In Fixed Hours mode, default working hours apply to all employees

payroll.title: Payroll Configuration Guide
payroll.desc: Set up default salary type, pay day, cutoff day, and payroll calculation rules.
payroll.tip1: Cutoff day should be at least 5 days before pay day for processing time
payroll.tip2: Standard working days affect daily/hourly salary calculations

overtime.title: Overtime Configuration Guide
overtime.desc: Set up overtime multipliers, night shift hours, and overtime limits according to regulations.
overtime.tip1: Enable 'Use Legal Minimum Rates' to ensure compliance with regulations
overtime.tip2: Overtime limits help protect employee health and control costs

allowance.title: Allowance Configuration Guide
allowance.desc: Set up allowance types such as transportation, meals, phone... for employees.
allowance.tip1: Mark taxable allowances for accurate income tax calculation

deduction.title: Deduction Configuration Guide
deduction.desc: Set up deductions such as insurance, tax, late/early leave penalties.
deduction.tip1: Deduction order affects net salary calculation

summary.title: Configuration Summary
summary.incompleteWarning: Some configurations are incomplete. Please review and update.
